attributes.action: All Region 2 and promotion DVD must have subtitles and made accessible to minority groups
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We want all dvd's to have subtitles so our access to these services are available for when we request them, this also applies to promotion dvd (newspapers, government funded dvd, etc) ad also accessible to minority group

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "All Region 2 and promotion DVD must have subtitles and made accessible to minority groups."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page13240.asp

Prime Minister's Office
